title: Easy Vegetable Salad Recipe
instructions: Clean and dice vegetables .
Add in 1 large bottle of Hidden Valley Ranch dressing .
Allow to sit overnight .

title: Arly's Shoestring Salad for Sandwiches
instructions: Combine first 5 ingredients , adding just enough mayonnaise to moisten .
Cover and chill .
Just before serving , add shoestring potatoes ; mix well .
Add a little more mayonnaise , if necessary .
Season with salt and pepper , if desired .
Time to chill , I hour is included in the prep .
time .

title: Radicchio , Endive , and Carrot Salad
instructions: Combine first 3 ingredients in a medium bowl .
Add oil and remaining ingredients ; toss well .
Serve immediately .

title: Vegetable Salad
instructions: Place first five ingredients in saucepan .
Bring to boil , stir to dissolve sugar .
Cool .
I have also made this without sugar but used four packets of Equal , and it turns out just fine .
Combine vegetables and mix in cooled liquid .
Cover and refrigerate at least three hours to develop flavors , or longer .
Stir occasionally .
This easily keeps at least four days if tightly covered .

title: Oriental Chicken Salad
instructions: Combine first five ingredients in a large bowl .
Shake the rest of ingredients except noodles together .
Pour dressing over salad .
Serve with noodles .

title: Macaroni Salad Recipe
instructions: Cook 1 lb .
of macaroni - let cold .
Then add in :

title: Big Fat Greek Salad With White Beans , Kalamata Olives and Feta
instructions: Whisk together vinegar , oil , oregano , and pepper in a large bowl .
Add lettuce , carrots , cucumber , tomato , beans , and feta ; toss .
Either divide into 4 small bowls or keep in one large one .
Top with olives and croutons .

title: Garden Veggie Salad
instructions: Toss lettuce , cabbage , carrotss , squash and pea pods with dressing to make salad .
Sprinkle pecans over yogurt ; serve for dessert .
COMBINE CRYSTAL LIGHT On-the-GO packet with bottled water per package directions .

title: Sauerkraut Salad
instructions: Press excess juice from the sauerkraut .
Add green and red_peppers ( or use pimento for red color ) .
Add onion , celery , and carrots and mix gently .
Combine vinegar , oil and sugar and pour over vegetable .
Mix thoroughly and chill for several hours before serving .

title: Garbanzo Bean and Tuna Salad
instructions: Brush tuna with oil ; season with pepper to taste .
Grill 5 minutes on each side or until tuna flakes easily with fork .
Place in refrigerator to cool .
Break tuna into chunks .
Place in large bowl .
Add beans , tomatoes , asparagus and carrots ; mix lightly .
Add dressing ; toss to coat .
Cover .
Refrigerate at least 2 hours or until chilled .

title: Cucumber Carrot Salad ( Raita )
instructions: Mix cucumbers , carrots , and yogurt together in a large bowl ; season with salt .
Garnish with cilantro .

title: Cold Corn Salad
instructions: In a large bowl combine sour_cream , mayo , mustard , vinegar , sugar , salt , and pepper .
Mix well .
Add remaining stuff and toss to cover everything evenly .
Cover and refrigerate at least an hour .

title: Japanese Sunomono Salad
instructions: Put the noodles in boiling water and cook until tender .
Drain for 20- 30 minutes .
Put in a big bowl and add vinegar , sugar , soy_sauce , salt and sesame .
Divide the noodles into individual dishes and top with a small amount of each of the remaining ingredients .
Can be refrigerated and served next day .

title: Super Salad
instructions: In a large glass bowl , combine all salad ingredients ( can be layered , but it's easier to serve if veggies are tossed first ) .
Press down veggies lightly so that the top is even .
Top salad with an even layer of frozen peas .
Combine sugar and mayonnaise .
Spread mayonnaise evenly over peas .
Top with cheese and then bacon bits .
Can be made the day before .

title: Orange and Purple Tossed Salad
instructions: In a non-reactive bowl combine all the vinaigrette ingredients except for the oil .
Whisk .
Slowly whisk in the oil and incorporate .
Vinaigrette is best prepared at least 1 hour in advance .
Place the chopped lettuce in a salad bowl .
Add the orange slices , carrots and spring_onions .
Toss gently .
Serve vinaigrette on side .
( Whisk dressing again just before serving .
Serving is estimated .

title: Hawaiian Macaroni Salad
instructions: Cook macaroni till tender .
Add grated carrots , mayonnaise , and milk till well coated .
Salt & Pepper to taste .
Use more mayonnaise if needed .
Chill in refrigerator .
When ready to serve , add more mayonnaise to keep salad from drying out .

title: Japanese Pounded Cucumber Salad - Shojin Ryori
instructions: Salt cucumber lightly and using a blunt side of kitchen knife or wooden rolling pin , lightly pound the cucumber to break down the flesh somewhat up and down .
Cut the cucumber into 1 1/4 inch or 3cm pieces .
Julienne carrot into about 1 1/4 inch or 3 cm pieces .
Parboil for about 1 minute and chill in cold water .
Drain .
Julienne ginger and soak in cold water for about 10 minutes .
Drain .
Cut dry hot chili pepper into thin ringlets .
Combine sesame_oil , soy_sauce , sugar , vinegar and salt to taste in a bowl with cucumber , carrot , ginger and dry hot chili pepper .
Let the mixture marinate for 1 hour before serving .

title: Chicken-and-Grape Salad Sandwich
instructions: In a large pot , cover the chicken_breasts with water .
Bring to a gentle simmer and cook for 15 to 20 minutes , or until cooked through .
Remove the chicken from the water and let cool .
Cut into 1/2-inch pieces and set aside .
In a large bowl combine the mayonnaise , mustard and chili_powder .
Stir in the chicken , carrotss and grape halves .
Season with salt and pepper , to taste .
Assemble the sandwiches with your choice of bread , chicken salad mixture and toppings .

title: Pickled Carrot Salad
instructions: The original recipe says to cook the carrots in a small amount of water until crisp/tender and drain .
Sometimes I do , sometimes I don't .
Depends on how crunchy you like your salad .
Place carrots in a serving dish .
Combine remaining ingredients and whisk together well .
Pour over carrots , cover and chill for several hours or overnight .
Be sure you serve with a slotted spoon .

title: Cauliflower Salad
instructions: Chop cauliflower , carrots , onion , and bacon into a large salad bowl ( perferably that has a lid ) .
Whisk together mayonnaise and sugar in another bowl .
Pour over vegetable mixture , put lid on and shake to insure all vegetables are covered in dressing .
Place in fridge overnight to marinate .
Best if left turned upside down .

title: Warm Lentil Salad with Sausage
instructions: Bring lentils , water , and bay_leaf to a boil in a 2- to 3-quart heavy saucepan , then reduce heat and simmer , covered , until almost tender , about 15 minutes .
Stir in 1/2 teaspoon salt , then simmer lentils , covered , until tender but not falling apart , 3 to 5 minutes .

While lentils simmer , cook onion , carrots , celery , garlic , thyme , 1/4 teaspoon salt , and 1/8 teaspoon pepper in 2 tablespoons oil in a 12-inch heavy skillet over moderately low heat , stirring occasionally , until vegetables are just softened , 7 to 9 minutes .
Make vinaigrette by whisking together vinegar , mustard , and remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/8 teaspoon pepper in a bowl .
Add remaining 1/2 cup oil in a slow stream , whisking until blended well .
Drain lentils in a colander , discarding bay_leaf , and return to saucepan along with vegetable mixture and vinaigrette .
Cook over low heat , stirring , until heated through .
Keep warm , covered .
Brown kielbasa in cleaned and dried 12-inch heavy skillet ( in 2 batches if necessary ) , turning over once , about 2 minutes per batch .
Stir kielbasa and parsley into lentils .
